snippet.title: Dance Central 2 - E3 2011: Kinect Debut Trailer | OFFICIAL | HD
snippet.description:
New songs for the kinect game Dance Central 2, multiplayer gameplay, and a peek at some new characters and venues can you watch in this E3 2011 Trailer.

ABOUT THIS GAME
************************
Dance Central 2, a new Xbox 360 game with Kinect support that brings a new focus to multiplayer, enabling 2 dancers to team up and dance collaboratively, or go head to head in a simultaneous Dance Battle. Dance Central 2 also expands the Dance Central universe with new venues, characters and game modes. Players will meet new "dance crews" and be able to team up with their friends or challenge them to a head-to-head Dance Battle, proving once and for all who really has the best moves. In addition, fans will be able to import songs from the original Dance Central disc and add-on content for the game into their Dance Central 2 Music Library, with access to more than 100 songs will be available at launch.

Dance Central 2
******************
GENRE: Music
RELEASE DATE(S): Nov, 2011
PLATFORM: Xbox 360
EXCLUSIVELY ON: Xbox 360 Kinect
WEBSITE: http://www.dancecentral.com/
PRE-ORDER / BUY on AMAZON: http://amzn.to/jAucfC

PUBLISHER: Microsoft
DEVELOPER: Harmonix
ESRB: RP-T+ for Rating Pending, Targeting a Rating of Teen or Above

XboxViewTV ON TWITTER
*******************************
http://www.twitter.com/xboxviewtv
